mapper.insert: insert into car(car_code, car_name, car_inc, car_size, car_trans, car_type, car_img, car_img2, car_img3) values(#{carCode}, #{carName}, #{carInc}, #{carSize}, #{carTrans}, #{carType}, #{carImg}, #{carImg2}, #{carImg3})
mapper.update: update car set car_code=#{carCode}, car_name=#{carName}, car_inc=#{carInc}, car_size=#{carSize}, car_trans=#{carTrans}, car_type=#{carType}, car_img=#{carImg}, car_img2=#{carImg2}, car_img3=#{carImg3} where car_code=#{carCode}
mapper.select: select admin_pwd from rent_admin where admin_id=#{adminId}
